modpack.name: Tech World 2
modpack.author: The FTB Team
modpack.description: Want to create massive factories or giant power plants? No time for wands and wizardry? This mod pack is for you. All tech no magic.

modpack.name: FTBLite2
modpack.author: The FTB Team
modpack.description: Not everyone has a massive monster of a computer. This pack is designed for people with less RAM and older systems. It will give you a full tech tree while being playable on 1GB of RAM and 32 bit Java.These mods had the lightest overhead in testing.

modpack.name: Magic Farm 2:Adventures in Technology
modpack.author: Jadedcat
modpack.description: This is not a magic based pack.Forget everything you know about Minecraft. This pack is a conversion pack. Wooden tools? Ha.. no. Try not to die in a pack inspired by Don't Starve, Terrafirmacraft , Diablo 3 and the Cooking Channel. This world wants you dead and you will need to carve out a safe place to survive.

modpack.name: BloodNBones
modpack.author: Eyamaz
modpack.description: Because Hardcore just isn't Hardcore enough. This pack is not for the casual player. Warning! This pack does not support adding/removing mods. Adding mods will break progression, removing mods will break recipe changes. Recommended JVM Arguments: -XX:+UseParNewGC -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CICompilerCountPerCPU -XX:+TieredCompilation
modpack.mods: AOBD by ganymedes01; Applied Energistics by AlgorithmX2; ArmorStatusHUD by bspkrs; Backpacks by Eydamos; Big Reactors by Erogenous Beef; Biomes O' Plenty by BoP Team; Blood Magic by WayofTime; Cave Control by Reika; Chicken Chunks by Chickenbones; Computercraft by Dan200; Creeper Collateral by denoflions; DamageIndicators by rich1051414; Deadly World by FatherToast; Dynamic Lights by AtomicStryker; Dynamic Liquid Tanks 2 by WingsOfLife; Ender Forest by Reika; Enhanced Portals 3 by Alz454; EVOC by ProfMobious; Extra Utilities by RWTema; ExtraTiC by glassmaker; Flatsigns by Myrathi; Glenn's Gases by Glenn; Hardcore Ender Expansion by chylex; Hostile Worlds by Corosus; Hunger Overhaul by Iguana_man; Iguana Tweaks by Iguana_man; Inventory Tweaks by Kobata; Iguana Tweaks for TiC by Iguana_man; JABBA by PrefMobius; Lava Monsters by FatherToast; Lycanites Mobs by Lycanite; Magical Crops by Mark719; Metallurgy 3 by Team Metallurgy; Meteorcraft by Reika; MineFactory Reload by powercrystals, skyboy026; Minetweaker by StanH; Natura by mDiyo; Natural Absorption by FatherToast; NEI Addons by Bdew; NEI Plugins by mistiqur; NetherOres by powercrystals, skyboy026; NotEnoughItems by Chickenbones; Obsidiplates by Myrathi; Opis by ProfMobius; Pam's Harvestcraft by MatrexsVigil, Rhodox; Project:R3D by MrTJP, chickenbones; Random Things by lumien; RemoteIO by dmillerw; Roguelike Dungeons by Greymerk; SortFix by LexManos; Special Mobs by FatherToast; StatusEffectHUD by bspkrs; Thermal Expansion by Team COFH; Tinker's Construct by mDiyo; Utility Mobs by FatherToast; Waila by ProfMobius; Witchery by Emoniph; Zombie Awareness by Corosus

modpack.name: Agrarian Skies: Hardcore Quest
modpack.author: Jadedcat
modpack.description: Warning this pack does not support removing mods. As the sole survivor of the cataclysm you must rebuild and repopulate the planet. You must create your resources out of nothing. Quests from the creator will guide you on your journey and reward you as you progress singly or in teams.

modpack.name: New World Mod Pack
modpack.author: kylemcmqueen
modpack.description: Enjoy Minecraft in a all new way! New World on Feed the Beast allows you to encounter some of your favorite mods from all over the Minecraft community in a all new way! Force yourself to attempt new ways of survival, and even do it with your friends! New World Mod Packs offers a quality multiplayer server for you and your friends to enjoy the pack without the hassle of finding or hosting your own multiplayer server. Below you will find a list of all the mods you will encounter in your journeys threw his brave new world! I hope you enjoy the pack, and as always, happy mining!
modpack.mods: Additional Buildcraft Objects; ArmorStatus HUD; Animated Player Mod; Advanced Machines; Applied Energistics; Aroma1997's Core; BiblioCraft; Aroma1997's Dimensional World; bspkersCore; Buildcraft; CoFH Core; Compact Solar Arrays; ComputerCraft; Ancient Warfare; Damage Indicators; Ancient Warfare NEI Plugin; Extra Trees; Chisel; Extra Bees; ExtrabiomesXL; Hats; Dynamic Lights; ExtraUtils; Forestry; FoodPlus; Immibis TubeStuff; Immibis Dimensional Anchors; Forge Multipart; IndustrialCraft 2; Inventory Tweaks; Iron Chests; Jammy's Furniture Mod; IC2 Nuclear Control; Immibis Peripherals; Millenaire; MineFactory Reloaded; Logistics Pipes; Natura; NEI Plugins; NEI Addons; Open Blocks; Open CC Sensors; Open Peripheral Addons/Core; Railcraft; Open Mods Lib; Zan's Minimap; PowerCrystal's Core; Steve's Carts; Thermal Expansion; Traincraft; RemoteIO; Tinkers Construct; Transducers; UnderGround Biomes; Nuclear Control

modpack.name: RPG Immersion Pack
modpack.author: The Vethean Dream Team
modpack.description: Delve into multiple worlds and experience a true RPG feel. With dozens of hours of game play anybody can achieve what they desire to become. whether someone wants to become a mighty warrior; an explorer; a farmer or a builder; the RPG Immersion Pack offers it all. With 8 new and unique dimensions; over 115 mobs and bosses to be fought; hundreds of items and blocks; this pack is guaranteed to keep anybody entertained. The pack is updated regularly with new content to provide players with even more excitement.
modpack.mods: Forge; Code Chicken Core; Not Enough Items; DivineRPG; Damage Indicators; InvTweaks; Voxelmods

modpack.name: BronyModPack
modpack.author: The VoxelModPack Team
modpack.description: The BronyModPack is a set of client mods designed specifically to assist ponies on brony servers like Brohoof.com. This ModPack can be used any multiplayer server. Click here to visit The BronyModPack Forum Post for more information and instructions.
modpack.mods: LiteLoader by Mumfrey; VoxelEssentials by Chrismack; Mumfrey; and Verdana; VoxelMenu by xIGBClutchIx and Mumfrey; VoxelFlight by The VoxelModPack Team; VoxelWorld by xTiming; VoxelPlayer by xTiming; MamiyaOtaru; and Mumfrey; VoxelTextures by Mumfrey; Macro/Keybind Mod by Mumfrey; IntegratedSoundpacks by Mumfrey; VoxelGET by Mumfrey; MineLittlePony by Verdana; VoxelMap by MamiyaOtaru; VoxelSniperGUI by Thatapplefreak and Jimmynator; VoxelVisualizer by Mumfrey; WorldEdit CUI - LiteLoader Edition by yetanotherx; MCPatcher by Kahr

modpack.name: Ampz Modpack
modpack.author: The UE Team
modpack.description: Voltz/Ampz is a mod pack that consists of various Universal Electricity mods introducing a realistic and unique experience into Minecraft. Build large reactors and burn your enemies with missiles; create contraptions with force fields and machinery! The pack will be sure to bring exciting new possibilities into Minecraft!
modpack.mods: Applied Energistics (AlgorithmX2); Atomic Science (Calclavia); CoFHCore (King_Lemming); ChickenCode Core (ChickenBones); Not Enough Items (ChickenBones); Galacticraft (Micdoodle); Minefactory Reloaded (Powercrystals); ExtrabiomesXL (MisterFiber); ICBM (Calclavia); Inventory Tweaks (Kobata); Mekanism (Aidancbrady); Modular Force Field System (Calclavia); Minefactory Reloaded (Powercrystals); Modular Powersuits (MachineMuse); Modular Powersuits Addon (Andrew); Rei's Minimap (ReiFNSK); NEI Plugins (mistaqur); Immibis Core (Immbis); Immibis's Microblocks (Immbis); RedLogic (Immbis)

modpack.name: VoxelModPack
modpack.author: The VoxelModPack Team
modpack.description: The VoxelModPack is a set of client mods chosen specifically to assist users of multiplayer creative servers like the The Voxel Box. This ModPack can be used any multiplayer server. Click here to visit VoxelWiki for more information and instructions.

modpack.name: Magic Farm
modpack.author: Jadedcat
modpack.description: A modpack about farming magic exploration and food.Tech is secondary in this pack. Explore your world and try not to starve while you build.
